text: Jean-François de Galaup, comte de La Pérouse (1741—1788) was a French navigator who explored the Pacific Ocean. He died when his ship was wrecked in the New Hebrides during 1788. He met the English when they arrived in Australia with the First Fleet in January 1788. After a short stay in Botany Bay, he sailed away into the Pacific. ==References== Category:1741 births Category:1788 deaths Category:French nobility Category:French explorers
title: Jean-François de Galaup, comte de Lapérouse
